column4: I had a look at your pastebin, and there's no accept policy in the forward table.  Not sure if that means anything.
The funny thing is, I've never touched iptables at all.  It worked until about a week ago
It would be generous calling me a novice at ipables, but if it's anything like cisco access lists...
the instructions Jewfro-Macabbi  pointed to looked similar to what I did long ago.
